JobFullDesc: In People & Places, we handle all things people-related so our employees around the globe are empowered to do their best work. Our Talent Acquisition teams find, attract, and hire the world’s greatest minds to join Uber.About the RoleAs a Sourcing Manager, you will manage a team of technical outbound sourcers and help craft Uber’s pipelining strategies nationwide. You will mentor the team, foster operational excellence, and build creative solutions to drive meaningful results at scale.
